typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as long,
		runtime as long,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as long,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviePQ
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MovieForthCoffee
